item.title: Digital Ocean, its support and development database
item.description: Tip Currently, only use Postgres 14 on the Digital Ocean application platform for development databases. While following the book Zero2Prod you will learn how to deploy a Rust application to digital ocean through a Continuous Deployment pipeline. This is hardly anything new for me, I even teach a course in DevOps, but to not stray from the path of the book I followed its instructions. The spec for digital ocean looks like this (this is abbreviated for your reading pleasure):
